forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 63F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.
